participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and caring, enjoys working with children and is optimistic about the future.
participant_1.background: I have been in a relationship for 2 years. My dad is a dentist and my mom is a teacher. I work at a daycare. I am a college student. My major is in business administration.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, enjoys outdoor activities and helping others.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is red. I like to water ski. My dad was a cop. I spend my free time volunteering at nursing homes. I am tall.

content.text: Hi! I'm a college student majoring in business administration. I've been in a relationship for two years and my dad is a dentist and mom is a teacher. I work at a daycare.
Hi! My dad was a cop and my favorite color is red. I like to water ski and volunteer at nursing homes in my free time. I'm tall.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be tall but I'm only 5'5".
It's not always fun being tall. I have to be careful not to bump my head on things.
Yeah, I can imagine that being a problem.
So, what's your favorite thing about your job?
I love working with kids. They're so funny and energetic.
I bet they are! I don't have any kids of my own, but I love babysitting.
I don't have any either, but I'm thinking about having some in the future.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great parent.
So, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go out with my friends or stay in and watch a movie.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go water skiing with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I've never tried water skiing before.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
